document_data.caption: The Gap of Reth that connected Reth and Airspur.
document_data.name: Gap of Reth
document_data.mainbody: The '''Gap of Reth''' was the only passage across the [[Akanapeaks]] that connected the city of [[Reth]] to the west and [[Airspur (Chessenta)|Airspur]] to the east.
document_data.Location: The Gap of Reth was located in the northern portion of Akanapeaks and was part of [[Chessenta]]. The mountain pass connected the nation's main territory with its westernmost land at the city-state Reth.
document_data.History: At some point before the {{YearlinkName|1369}}, the Gap of Reth was the site of a fierce Chessentan battle that left many of its survivors crippled and bitter drunks. [[Bashar]] and [[Morka]] were among the soldiers who participated in the war and survived the bloodshed.
